snippet: WNET, on the occasion of its 50th anniversary, is seeking 50,000 new donors in the next 18 months — “a pretty ambitious goal,” one executive said.
abstract: New York City public television station WNET begins an ambitious 50th anniversary fund-raising campaign, hoping to encourage 50,000 new donors in the next 18 months.
lead_paragraph: WNET, on the occasion of its 50th anniversary, is seeking 50,000 new donors in the next 18 months — “a pretty ambitious goal,” one executive said.
